thread.title: Holly Willoughby, Abbey Clancy and Pixie Lott flash their legs as they stumble out of wild star-studded BRIT Awards 2017 after party
thread.title_full: Holly Willoughby, Abbey Clancy and Pixie Lott flash their legs as they stumble out of wild star-studded BRIT Awards 2017 after party

author: Rebecca Pocklington
title: Holly Willoughby, Abbey Clancy and Pixie Lott flash their legs as they stumble out of wild star-studded BRIT Awards 2017 after party
text:
TV Magazine GOOD NIGHT GUYS? Holly Willoughby, Abbey Clancy and Pixie Lott flash their legs as they stumble out of wild star-studded BRIT Awards 2017 after party 
The stars looked like they had a great night as they were snapped leaving the event By REBECCA POCKLINGTON Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments HOLLY Willoughby, Abbey Clancy and Pixie Lott led a stream of stars flashing the flesh as they stumbled out of a wild Brits after party last night. 
Musicians, TV presenters, reality stars and more joined forces at the Warner Music bash, and appeared to have a great night as they partied until the early hours. MagicmomentsUK Holly Willoughby showed off her endless legs in the daring silver dress Goff Photos 9 Good night Holly? The star looked VERY happy 
Leading the pack was Holly who looked slightly worse for wear as she hopped in to a waiting car, showing off her stunning figure in her bum-skimming silver sequinned dress. 
With her hair wild round her face and her make-up still in place, she flashed a huge smile and looked relaxed and happy. 
The star risked a wardrobe malfunction as she got into a car, but managed to maintain her modesty like a pro. 
Elsewhere, Abbey Clancy appeared tired out after her night out, as she showed off her killer figure in a black and white printed thigh-split dress. MagicmomentsUK Holly Willoughby managed to smile throughout her exit Rex Features Abbey needed a helping hand outside Rex Features 9 Abbey Clancy flashed her endless legs in a daring thigh-split 
The star failed to flash a smile as she was led outside, and showed every sign of a great night out. 
Still towering in strappy black stilettos, Abbey led the style stakes after the long night out, and even managed to remain covered up with her dress riding dangerously high. MagicmomentsUK Abbey Clancy failed to flash a smile MagicmomentsUK 9 Pixie Lott was all legs as she left in a waiting car 
Pixie Lott made a slightly less dignified exit, as she was all legs in the back of a car. 
Keeping her arm over her chest as she struggled to avoid a wardrobe malfunction in a daring cut-out silver dress, the singer instead flashed every inch of her toned pins. Getty Images Ellie Goulding danced with Katy Perry inside Goff Photos 9 Katy Perry flashed her bra as she left the bash 
The stunner left with her other half Oliver Cheshire, and ensured she got comfortable straight away as they left the party. 
Meanwhile Ellie Goulding let her hair down inside as she danced with Katy Perry, following the stunnerâ€™s earlier performance.
